_description: A roundel by Charles d’Orléans — 14 lines in French and English

BLHar682.First Lines:
Oblesse oblesse que porrar oblerAll heuy thought þat bryngith
                    in distres…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…ffor so farcast am y in hevynesThat though y wolde y may in no
                    manere
BLHar682.Note: As written, repeats first words of lines 1-2 at end to indicate going back to first four lines of the roundel.
